name: Robbery Bob (itch)
description:
/!\ If the loading seems to freeze, don't worry, it's just an heavy file loading /!\

Game:
Bob is a thief who has the ability to stop time ! However, one day, he loses his power. While trying to escape the cops, he must find enough money to go to the forest in order to get help.

Controls:

Keyboard: 

 - W/Z to jump
 - A/Q and D to move
 - SPACE to interact
 - Mouse to select

Xbox Controller:

 - A to jump
 - Stick left and right to move
 - X to interact

More info at the Ludum Dare submission page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/robbery-bob
